chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
init_state \In Coh V

Premises:
init_state = l1 \\-> init_dstatelet1 \+ l2 \\-> init_dstatelet2 : state
Coh = fun (w : world) (s : state) => [/\ valid w, valid s, hook_complete w, dom (cT:=union_mapUMC Label protocol) w.1 =i dom (cT:=union_mapUMC Label dstatelet) s & forall l : Label, coh (getProtocol w l) (getStatelet s l)] : world -> Pred state
V = W1 \+ W2 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)
rely_ext : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> forall (this : nid) (i : state) (j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s : state), i \In Coh V -> network_rely W this (i \+ j) s -> exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, s = i' \+ j' /\ i' \In Coh V
Injection.Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
Injection.Exports.Inject : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (E : world), hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E -> V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K) -> hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K -> (forall s : state, Coh V s <-> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2])) -> (forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 -> network_step V this (s1 \+ s) (s2 \+ s)) ->...-> Injection.injects U V K
Record injects (U V : world) (K : hooks) : Type := Inject { E : world; _ : hook_complete U /\ hook_complete E; _ : V = U \+ E \+ (Unit, K); _ : hooks_consistent (U \+ E) K; _ : forall s : state, Coh V s < -> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh E s2]); _ : forall (s1 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (s2 : state) (s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (this : nid), s1 \+ s \In Coh V -> network_step U this s1 s2 ->...-> network_step U this s1 s2 /\ s1' = s2' \/ network_step E this s1' s2' /\ s1 = s2 } Arguments Injection.Inject [U V K E] _ _ _ (_ _ _)%function_scope
inject_rule : forall (this : nid) (W V : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (w : injects V W K) (e1 : DT this V A) (i j : state) (r : cont A), i \In Coh V -> verify i e1 (fun (x : A) (i' : state) => forall j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, i' \+ j' \In Coh W -> network_rely (inj_ext w) this j j' -> r x (i' \+ j')) -> verify (i \+ j) (iinject e1) r
a_safe_coh : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a : Actions.action W V this) (s : state), Actions.a_safe a s -> s \In Coh W
Actions.a_safe_coh : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a : Actions.action W V this) (s : state), Actions.a_safe a s -> s \In Coh W
cohE : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks) (w : injects U V K) (s : state), Coh V s < -> (exists s1 s2 : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ s = s1 \+ s2, Coh U s1 & Coh (inj_ext w) s2])
coh_hooks : forall (U : world) (K : union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type) (s : state), s \In Coh (U \+ (Unit, K)) -> s \In Coh U
aft_inject : forall (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (w : injects V W K) (this : nid) (p : proc this V A) (P : A -> state -> Prop) (i j : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), i \+ j \In Coh W -> after i p P -> after (i \+ j) (Inject (W:=W) (K:=K) w p) (fun (v : A) (m : state) => exists i' j' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet, [/\ m = i' \+ j', i' \In Coh V, network_rely (inj_ext w) this j j' & P v i'])
coh_split : forall (W1 W2 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s : state), s \In Coh (W1 \+ W2) -> hook_complete W1 -> hook_complete W2 -> exists s1 s2 : state, [/\ s1 \In Coh W1, s2 \In Coh W2 & s = s1 \+ s2]
projectS_cohR : forall (W1 W2 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s : state), s \In Coh (W1 \+ W2) -> hook_complete W2 -> projectS W2 s \In Coh W2
projectS_cohL : forall (W1 W2 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s : state), s \In Coh (W1 \+ W2) -> hook_complete W1 -> projectS W1 s \In Coh W1
with_inv_coh : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (s : state), s \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> s \In Coh (mkWorld pr)
call_rule' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (i : state) (f : DT this W A) (k : cont A), (i \In Coh W -> pre_of f i) -> (forall (x : A) (m : state), post_of f i x m -> m \In Coh W -> k x m) -> verify i f k
pstep_inv : forall (this : nid) (A : Type) (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (s1 s2 : state) (sc : schedule) (t t' : proc this (mkWorld pr) A), s1 \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> pstep s1 t sc s2 t' -> s2 \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))
call_rule : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (p : Pred state) (q : A -> Pred state) (i : state) (e : DHT [this,W] (p,q)) (k : cont A), (i \In Coh W -> p i) -> (forall (x : A) (m : state), q x m -> m \In Coh W -> k x m) -> verify i (with_spec e) k
stepInject : forall (this : nid) (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type) (em : injects V W K) (s1 : state) (t : proc this V A) (sc : schedule) (s2 : state) (q : proc this W A), pstep s1 (Inject (W:=W) (K:=K) em t) sc s2 q <-> (exists (s1' : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet) (v : A), [/\ sc = InjectRet, t = Ret v, q = Ret v, s2 = s1 & extends (U:=V) (V:=W) (K:=K) em s1 s1']) \/ (exists (sc' : schedule) (t' : proc this V A) (s1' s2' s : union_mapPCM Label dstatelet), [/\ sc = InjectStep sc', q = Inject (W:=W) (K:=K) em t', s1 = s1' \+ s, s2 = s2' \+ s, s1 \In Coh W & p...
projectSE : forall (W1 W2 : prodPCM (union_mapPCM Label protocol) (union_mapPCM hook_domain hook_type)) (s : state), s \In Coh (W1 \+ W2) -> s = projectS W1 s \+ projectS W2 s
aft_ind_inv : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (A : Type) (this : nid) (p : proc this (mkWorld pr) A) (P : A -> state -> Prop) (i : state), i \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> after i p P -> after i (WithInv pr I ii (erefl (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))) p) (fun (v : A) (m : state) => m \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) /\ P v m)
um_pts : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type), K -> V -> union_mapUMC K V
inj_ext : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks), Injection.injects U V K -> world
alw_coh : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always s p P -> s \In Coh W
extends : forall (U V : world) (K : hooks), injects U V K -> union_mapPCM Label dstatelet -> union_mapPCM Label dstatelet -> Prop
vrf_coh : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (e : DT this W A) (i : state) (r : A -> state -> Prop), (i \In Coh W -> verify i e r) -> verify i e r
alw_coh' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), always_sc s p scs P -> s \In Coh W
Actions.a_step : forall (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) (a : Actions.action W V this) (s1 : state), Actions.a_safe a s1 -> state -> V -> Prop
inject : forall (this : nid) (V W : world) (K : hooks) (A : Type), injects V W K -> DT this V A -> DT this W A
with_inv_step : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (z : nid) (s1 s2 : state), s1 \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> network_step (mkWorld pr) z s1 s2 -> network_step (mkWorld (ProtocolWithInvariant.ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) z s1 s2
Inject : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (V : world) (K : hooks), injects V W K -> proc this V A -> proc this W A
alw_unfin : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 Unfinished) -> always s1 Unfinished P
Record action (W : world) (V : Type) (this : nid) : Type := Action { a_safe : state -> Prop; a_safe_coh : forall s : state, a_safe s -> s \In Coh W; a_step : forall s1 : state, a_safe s1 -> state -> V -> Prop; step_total : forall (s : state) (pf : a_safe s), exists (s' : state) (r : V), a_step s pf s' r; step_sem : forall (s1 : state) (pf : a_safe s1) (s2 : state) (r : V), a_step s1 pf s2 r -> network_step W this s1 s2 } Arguments Actions.action _ _%type_scope Arguments Actions.Action [W] [V]%type_scope [this] [a_safe]%function_scope _%function_scope [a_step]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope
union_mapUMC : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type), union_map_class K V
alw_ind_inv : forall (pr : protocol) (I : dstatelet -> pred nid -> Prop) (ii : InductiveInv pr I) (A : Type) (this : nid) (p : proc this (mkWorld pr) A) (P : state -> proc this (mkWorld pr) A -> Prop) (i : state), i \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) -> always i p P -> always i (WithInv pr I ii (erefl (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))) p) (fun (m : state) (q : proc this (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) A) => m \In Coh (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii)) /\ ((exists q' : proc this (mkWorld pr) A, q = WithInv pr I ii (erefl (mkWorld (ProtocolWithIndInv ii))) q' /\ P m q') \/ (exists v' : A, q = Ret v' /\ P m (Ret v'))))
union_map_classPCM : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type), union_map_class K V -> pcm
UMC.sort : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type), union_map_class K V -> Type
cond : forall (K : ordType) (V : Type), union_map_class K V -> simpl_pred K
alw_ret' : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s1 : state) (v : A) (scs : seq schedule) (P : state -> proc this W A -> Prop), s1 \In Coh W -> (forall s2 : state, network_rely W this s1 s2 -> P s2 (Ret v)) -> always_sc s1 (Ret v) scs P
aft_imp : forall (this : nid) (W : world) (A : Type) (s : state) (p : proc this W A) (P1 P2 : A -> state -> Prop), (forall (v : A) (s0 : state), s0 \In Coh W -> P1 v s0 -> P2 v s0) -> after s p P1 -> after s p P2
Actions.skip_step : forall (W : world) (l : Label) (p : protocol), getProtocol W l = p -> forall V : Type, (forall s : state, coh p (getStatelet s l) -> V) -> forall s1 : state, Actions.skip_safe W s1 -> state -> V -> Prop

```coq
apply a_safe_coh.
apply cohE.
rewrite rely_ext.
apply c. apply p.
```

original: apply a_safe_coh. apply cohE. rewrite rely_ext. apply c. apply p.
